extraction.title: 0.5.08 crashes
extraction.comments:
What connect settings have you set? Well, same as for .06; imported from backup. Hostname, port, TLS, etc. all look sane. Picked up phone. Opened app. I see locations.... Weird. Can you send me your config (minus username and pw) please? I'd like to reproduce it here. The crash report isn't helpful in this case.
On 18 Mar 2015, at 06:50, JP Mens <notifications@github.com> wrote:
Picked up phone. Opened app. I see locations....
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub <https://github.com/owntracks/android/issues/125#issuecomment-82755457>.
